page.title: 13THE LIBRARY
page.content: {Edwinstowe Public Library}is in the High Street and was built in 1971. The library assistant told us she had been working in libraries for sixteen years.{60%}of the clients are{old age {pensioners}and like light fiction. Three other people work with her and they are all used to dealing with{ {tourists}asking where {Robin Hood lives.{Rufford}pupils who live in Edwinstowe go for Homework books and many five and six year olds go to borrow six books at a time. On a normal day seventy clients visit the library to borrow,return or research information. As well as books they have a{microfiche reader}to do bibliographic research.{Old parish {records}can be read on the reader if arrangements are made to borrow them from Ollerton.
